BTE4410 - Course Construction in Busines.name: BTE4410 - Course Construction in Business Education

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An overview and examination of business curriculum and methodology integrated into the workforce frameworks. Planning and preparation of materials, managing the course, and involvement in career & technical student organizations.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Educational Leadership & Higher Education
